**To detect text in an image**

The following ``detect-text`` command detects text in the specified image. ::

    aws rekognition detect-text \
        --image '{"S3Object":{"Bucket":"MyImageS3Bucket","Name":"ExamplePicture.jpg"}}'

Output::

    {
        "TextDetections": [
